column1: '''John Charles Elton Le Mesurier De Somerys Halliley''' ([[5 April
column3: November 15]], [[1983]]) voiced the part of [[Bilbo Baggins]] in [[The Lord of the Rings (1981 radio series)
column4: ''The Lord of the Rings'' 1981 radio series]] broadcasted on [[BBC
column5: BBC 4]]. He also sang a demo version ''[[Bilbo's Last Song]]'', which was first aired in [[1982]] and appeared as an extra on the third volume in the [[2002]] reissue of the series.
